name: Update Docsify from GitHub Wiki

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - trusted-main

jobs:
  update-docs:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Fetch GitHub Wiki content
        run: |
          git clone https://github.com/msmannan00/Orion-Search.wiki.git wiki
          rm -rf docs/*
          cp -r wiki/* docs/
          echo "GitHub Wiki content copied to Docsify docs folder."

      - name: Initialize Docsify Main Page
        run: |
          echo "# Orion Search Documentation" > docs/README.md
          echo "This site is auto-generated from the GitHub Wiki." >> docs/README.md

      - name: Commit and push changes
        run: |
          git config --global user.name "github-actions"
          git config --global user.email "github-actions@github.com"
          git add docs/
          git commit -m "Auto-update Docsify from GitHub Wiki"
          git push origin trusted-main

      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
        uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3
        with:
          github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          publish_dir: ./docs
